biotools.summary: This app provides a user interface for the open-source R package marr, which implements the method Maximum Rank Reproducibility (MaRR), a nonparametric approach that detects reproducible signals using a maximal rank statistic for high-dimensional biological data.

bioschemas.name: MaRR
bioschemas.summary: This app provides a user interface for the open-source R package marr, which implements the method Maximum Rank Reproducibility (MaRR), a nonparametric approach that detects reproducible signals using a maximal rank statistic for high-dimensional biological data.
